name: @phosphor/widgets
notes: PhosphorJS is an archived (2019) browser-only UI widget library for building desktop-style web applications. Provides widgets, layouts, and DOM manipulation for complex browser UIs. Originally used by JupyterLab, now superseded by @jupyterlab/lumino. Requires DOM APIs (window, document, HTMLElement) which are not available in Workers. Designed for client-side browser rendering, not serverless environments.
